timeline.author: loosebazooka

timeline.bodyText: It seems like if we only use one registry, then buildAndRunComplex doesn't need to accept registry info as parameters?
timeline.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: Ohhh, that's right. Also no need to accept username and password info.
replies.author: chanseokoh

timeline.message: Don't pass registry instance and username/password
